lead_paragraph: World number one Novak Djokovic gave French teenager Quentin Halys a free tennis lesson for about an hour before the wildcard showed how much he had learnt in the Serb's 6-1 6-2 7-6(3) Australian Open second round win on Wednesday.
snippet: World number one Novak Djokovic gave French teenager Quentin Halys a free tennis lesson for about an hour before the wildcard showed how much he had learnt in the Serb's 6-1 6-2 7-6(3) Australian Open second round win on Wednesday....

headline.main: Djokovic Given Third Set Fright by French Wildcard
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Given Third Set Fright by French Wildcard
